name: Tamed Ocean
desc: The people who live on $market have long since tamed the oceans. Using specialized technologies to make the constraints of their world work to their advantage. A mastered aquaculture with various species of fish and algae fed by special nutrients in the water. Using the very high pressure of the ocean floor in heavy industry and mining. Housing their ships in underwater docks. The ocean is an integral part of culture, religion and everyday life.
